title: Dexterity
content:
Dexterity Dexterity influences your chance to land a hit (Attack Roll) and your damage with Dexterity-based weapons. It also influences your chance of going first in combat (Initiative) and the enemy's chance of hitting you (Armour Class).

Dexterity influences your chance to land a hit (Attack Roll) and your damage with Dexterity-based weapons. It also influences your chance of going first in combat (Initiative) and the enemy's chance of hitting you (Armour Class).

Dexterity is an Ability in B
